verses.1: Topa aw, a hehsa-in kei hong taii kei inla, lung so sa in kei hong thuhilh kei in.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma thaltangte ka sungah hong tum khin a, ka tungah na khuttum hong tu khinta hi.
verses.3: Nangma hehna hangin kei ka ci na a, ka mawhna hangin ka pumtangin ka na hi.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mawhnate in ka lu dong hong tuum zo a, keima puak dingin a gik lua van gik tawh kibang hi.
verses.5: Ka haina hangin ka liamnate naai-in uih a,
verses.6: keimah hong kikunsak a, hong kibokcipsak hi. Sun thapai-in kapin ka vak kawikawi hi.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka ci sa mahmah a, nakpi takin ka ci na hi.
verses.8: Kei hong kinengcip gawpin ka thahatna bei mangkhin a, ka lungsim gimna hangin thumin ka tautau hi.
verses.9: Topa aw, ka deihna khempeuh na thei a, ka khuisatnate na za hi.
verses.10: Ka lungtang kisat a, ka tha in lel hi. Ka mit in zong khua mu thei nawn lo hi.
verses.11: Ka gim thuakna ah ka lawmte le ka kithuahpihte kidang koih uh a, keima behte nangawn kei kiang pan gamla om uh hi.
verses.12: Kei a hong that nuamte in a thang uh zak a, keiʼ nat nading a zongte in siat nading thu bek gen uh a, sun thapai-in khemna bekbek ngaihsutin nei uh hi.
verses.13: Ahih hangin kei pen bilngong ka bang a, khua ka za kei hi. A kam a ka thei lo, a pau thei lo mi ka bang hi.
verses.14: Bil khua za lo, tawnna kam a za thei lo mi khat tawh kei ka kibang takpi hi.
verses.15: Ahih hangin Topa aw, nangmah kong muang hi. Topa ka Pasian aw, a hong dawng ding pa nangmah na hi hi.
verses.16: Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Ka khe a taal ciangin kei tunga hong kihisakte, keima gim thuakna ah lungdamsak kei in,” cih bek kong thum hi.
verses.17: Bang hang hiam cih leh puk dingin ka kithawi a, ka gimna kam tuan lo hi.
verses.18: Ka thuman lohna ka pulak a, ka mawhna hangin ka dah hi.
verses.19: A thuman lopi-in ka gal ahite thahat a, kei a hong mudah khialte tam mahmah uh hi.
verses.20: A hoih gamta ka hih manin ka hoihna pen siatna tawh a hong thukte ka langpangte ahi hi.
verses.21: Topa aw, kei hong nusia kei in. Ka Pasian aw, ka kiang pan gamla om keʼn!
verses.22: Topa, kei hong honpa aw, keimah a hong huh dingin hong manlang in.
